name: mic_lookup
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool hull_id_boat_hin_decoder.
Tool description: Decode the 12 digit HIN and check if it is valid. HINDecoder is used by many State DMV's and has been running for 7+ years.
API description: Performs a lookup of a Manufacturer Identification Code (MIC) to retrieve information about a boat manufacturing company using the Hull ID Boat HIN Decoder API.

mic.description: The Manufacturer Identification Code (MIC) of the boat manufacturing company.
